> >
> > I think he's saying that CppUnit is the right tool for you. Since C 
> > code is valid C++ code,
> 
> Not true. There are trivial and not-so-trivial reasons why 
> this is so; also some valid C code is valid C++ code with 
> different operational behaviour.
> 
> The OP may or may not be willing to work in the safe intersection.
> 
> There are C unit test harnesses out there; I have looked and 
> found them (but not so far tried any of them, since it's a 
> sufficiently low priority that it gets pushed down the stack).
> 

I've found CppUnitLite to work quite well for both C and C++ projects.
